title.rendered: Log Home Living features Birch LedgeCut33 and Soho Boutique Fireplace Surround

content.rendered: Written for affluent log home enthusiasts and homeowners, Log Home Living features Eldorado Stone’s Birch LedgeCut33 with a Soho Boutique Fireplace Surround in the February 2016 issue. Serving as the primary image within the “Hearth Warming” article, the installed stone fireplace captivates readers. The editor states that the profile can provide a “distinctive style” with a “natural random look.” The feature can be found on page 82.
